name: snail - a love letter to the sea
name_original: snail - a love letter to the sea
description:
A small game about a small snail.

A love letter to the sea, and to my favourite song, 달팽이 (Snail) by Panic. 

And a gift to everyone going forever to find the sea at the end of the world.

Instructions
  • You just need the right arrow key to play.
  • I recommend playing with the karaoke version in the background to have the full pixel game experience.

한국어 버전을 보려면 클릭하세요.
